Commands.Cross-Slash: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Inflicts Paralysis for 1 turn with a low probability.
Commands.Finishing Touch: 4-HIT BRV attack.  Initiates a Chase Sequence.
Commands.Critical Crush: 3-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Moderately raises critical BRV damage dealt  Slightly raises Max BRV for 2 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Meteorain: 6-HIT AoE ranged BRV+HP attack.  BRV damage is spread among all targets.  HP damage is divided equally between all targets.  Grants Mako for 4 turns.  Mako raises Max BRV and grants BRV Regen.

Passives.Cross-Slash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Cross-Slash/+.
Passives.Cross-Slash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Cross-Slash/+.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Hard Hit: Grants a low probability of inflicting a Small Defense Down debuff to the target for 2 turns after an HP Attack.
Passives.Finishing Touch Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Finishing Touch.
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Finishing Touch Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after using Finishing Touch.
Passives.Cross-Slash Charge: Increases the max uses of Cross-Slash by 1.
Passives.The Power of Mako: Slightly raises Attack for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and slightly raises Speed while buffed.
Passives.Cross-Slash Extend: When using Cross-Slash/+:- Raises BRV based on Attack before the BRV hits.- Moderately raises its potency.- Moderately raises Critical damage dealt.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150%.Turns HP Attack to HP Attack+ for 6 turns after using Cross-Slash/+.HP Attack+ is a 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack with a moderate increase to critical hits and a 120% overflow.
Passives.Smash Attack&Boost Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and moderately raises Attack for 8 turns after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Finishing Touch Extend: When using Finishing Touch:- Raises BRV based on Attack before the BRV hits.- Tremedously raises its potency.- Moderately raises Critical damage dealt.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150%.- Triggers an HP attack after use.- Slightly raises the potency of Max BRV Up, Physical Attack Up and Critical Rate Up and extends their duration by 3 turns.- Extends all buffs by 1 turn.Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ for 8 turns.BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT BRV attack with a moderate potency and critical damage increase.Turns Cross-Slash to Cross-Slash+ for 8 turns with the following effects:- Moderately raises the success rate of Paralysis.Turns back to Cross-Slash after use.
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Power: Raises Initial BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Critical Crush Extend: When using  Critical Crush :- Slightly improves the  Max BRV Up  effect

Weapons.Organyx CP: 15: Increases the potency of Cross-Slash and Cross-Slash+.Raises the success rate of Paralysis.
Weapons.Buster Sword NT Ver. CP: 35: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Cross-Slash, Cross-Slash+ and Finishing Touch.
Weapons.Force Stealer CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Meteorain.
Weapons.Greatsword of an Ethereal Mercenary CP:: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Cross-Slash ,  Cross-Slash+  and  Finishing Touch
Weapons.Rune Blade CP: 35: Increases the potency of Finishing Touch.Increases its max uses by 1.Grants Small Max BRV Up, Small Physical Attack Up and Small Critical Rate Up for 5 turns.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Critical Crush  use +1Duration of  Critical Crush  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Crimson Edge CP: 15: Removes one buff from the target when a command ability deals a critical hit.
